title: National Youth Day (India)
description: Commemorates the birth anniversary of Swami Vivekananda and celebrates youth empowerment.
importance: Inspires youth to contribute to nation-building.
Promotes the teachings and philosophy of Swami Vivekananda.

title: International Day of Women and Girls in Science
description: Promotes full and equal access to and participation in science for women and girls.
importance: Encourages gender equality in STEM fields.
Highlights the achievements of women scientists.

title: International Mother Language Day
description: Promotes linguistic and cultural diversity and multilingualism.
importance: Raises awareness of the importance of mother languages.
Encourages preservation of linguistic heritage.

title: World Consumer Rights Day
description: Raises global awareness about consumer rights and needs.
importance: Promotes consumer protection.
Highlights issues affecting consumers worldwide.

title: International Day of Happiness
description: Recognizes the importance of happiness and well-being as universal goals.
importance: Promotes happiness as a fundamental human goal.
Encourages policies that improve well-being.

title: World Autism Awareness Day
description: Raises awareness about autism spectrum disorder.
importance: Promotes understanding and acceptance of people with autism.
Encourages early diagnosis and intervention.

title: Earth Day
description: Promotes environmental protection and sustainability.
importance: Raises awareness about environmental issues.
Encourages actions to protect the planet.

title: World Red Cross and Red Crescent Day
description: Celebrates the principles of the International Red Cross and Red Crescent Movement.
importance: Honors humanitarian efforts worldwide.
Raises awareness about the work of the Red Cross and Red Crescent.

title: International Nurses Day
description: Honors the contributions of nurses to healthcare.
importance: Recognizes the dedication of nurses.
Raises awareness about the role of nursing in society.

title: World Environment Day
description: Encourages worldwide awareness and action for the protection of the environment.
importance: Promotes environmental conservation.
Highlights urgent environmental issues.

title: International Day of Yoga
description: Promotes the physical, mental, and spiritual benefits of practicing yoga.
importance: Encourages healthy living through yoga.
Raises awareness about the benefits of yoga.

title: World Mental Health Day
description: Raises awareness about mental health issues and promotes mental well-being.
importance: Encourages open discussions about mental health.
Promotes access to mental health care.

title: World Diabetes Day
description: Raises awareness about diabetes and its impact on health.
importance: Promotes education about diabetes prevention and management.
Encourages healthy lifestyle choices.

title: World AIDS Day
description: Raises awareness about HIV/AIDS and commemorates those who have died from the disease.
importance: Promotes understanding and support for people living with HIV/AIDS.
Encourages efforts to prevent the spread of HIV.

title: World Cancer Day
description: Raises awareness about cancer and encourages its prevention, detection, and treatment.
importance: Promotes cancer education and research.
Encourages early detection and healthy lifestyle choices.

title: World Tuberculosis Day
description: Raises public awareness about the devastating health, social, and economic consequences of tuberculosis.
importance: Promotes efforts to end the global TB epidemic.
Encourages early diagnosis and treatment.

title: World Health Day
description: Marks the founding of the World Health Organization and draws attention to global health issues.
importance: Raises awareness about important health topics.
Encourages governments and organizations to take action.

title: World Heart Day
description: Raises awareness about cardiovascular diseases and promotes heart-healthy living.
importance: Encourages prevention and control of heart disease.
Promotes healthy lifestyle choices.

title: International Day of Persons with Disabilities
description: Promotes the rights and well-being of persons with disabilities in all spheres of society.
importance: Raises awareness about disability issues.
Encourages inclusion and accessibility in healthcare.

title: World Braille Day
description: Raises awareness about the importance of Braille as a means of communication for blind and partially sighted people.
importance: Promotes equal access to healthcare information for visually impaired individuals.
Highlights the importance of inclusive healthcare communication.

title: World Leprosy Day
description: Raises awareness about leprosy (Hansen's disease) and promotes the dignity of people affected by it.
importance: Combats stigma associated with this curable disease.
Encourages early diagnosis and treatment to prevent disabilities.

title: World Neglected Tropical Diseases Day
description: Highlights the global effort to prevent and control neglected tropical diseases (NTDs).
importance: Brings attention to diseases affecting over 1 billion people worldwide.
Promotes increased investment in treatment and prevention programs.

title: International Childhood Cancer Day
description: Raises awareness about childhood cancer and shows support for children with cancer, survivors, and their families.
importance: Promotes early detection and proper diagnosis of childhood cancers.
Advocates for better access to treatment for all children with cancer.

title: World Hearing Day
description: Promotes ear and hearing care across the world and raises awareness about hearing loss prevention.
importance: Encourages regular hearing screening and early intervention.
Advocates for integration of ear and hearing care services into primary healthcare.

title: World Kidney Day
description: Raises awareness about the importance of kidney health and reducing the impact of kidney disease.
importance: Promotes preventive behaviors like hydration and regular exercise.
Encourages early screening for those with risk factors.

title: World Bipolar Day
description: Raises awareness about bipolar disorder and works to eliminate social stigma.
importance: Educates the public about this often misunderstood mental health condition.
Promotes support and treatment options for affected individuals.

title: World Parkinson's Day
description: Raises awareness about Parkinson's disease and its impact on people's lives.
importance: Promotes understanding of this progressive neurological disorder.
Advocates for better care and support for patients and caregivers.

title: World Hemophilia Day
description: Increases awareness of hemophilia and other bleeding disorders.
importance: Highlights the need for better diagnosis and access to care.
Promotes advocacy for people with inherited bleeding disorders.

title: World Malaria Day
description: Highlights the need for continued investment and political commitment for malaria prevention and control.
importance: Promotes malaria prevention strategies in endemic regions.
Highlights ongoing research for better treatments and vaccines.

title: World Asthma Day
description: Raises awareness about asthma and how it affects people's lives.
importance: Promotes better asthma management and treatment options.
Educates about triggers and environmental factors affecting asthma.

title: World Hypertension Day
description: Promotes public awareness of hypertension (high blood pressure) and encourages prevention, detection, and control.
importance: Raises awareness about this major risk factor for cardiovascular disease.
Encourages regular blood pressure monitoring and healthy lifestyle choices.

title: World Thyroid Day
description: Promotes awareness and understanding of thyroid health and the prevention and treatment of thyroid diseases.
importance: Educates about symptoms of thyroid disorders that often go undiagnosed.
Emphasizes the importance of proper thyroid function for overall health.

title: World No Tobacco Day
description: Highlights the health risks associated with tobacco use and advocates for effective policies to reduce consumption.
importance: Promotes prevention of tobacco-related diseases like cancer and COPD.
Advocates for tobacco control policies worldwide.

title: World Blood Donor Day
description: Thanks voluntary blood donors and raises awareness about the need for regular blood donations.
importance: Promotes safe blood supplies for medical treatments and emergencies.
Educates about the life-saving importance of blood donation.

title: World Hepatitis Day
description: Raises awareness about viral hepatitis and promotes prevention, diagnosis, and treatment.
importance: Educates about the different types of hepatitis and their transmission.
Promotes vaccination and testing for hepatitis B and C.

title: World Lung Cancer Day
description: Raises awareness about the causes and treatment of lung cancer and the importance of early detection.
importance: Promotes understanding of risk factors beyond smoking.
Advocates for early screening and improved treatment options.

title: International Overdose Awareness Day
description: Raises awareness of overdose and reduces the stigma of drug-related deaths.
importance: Promotes prevention and education about opioid overdose.
Remembers those who have died from drug overdose and acknowledges the grief of families.

title: World Sexual Health Day
description: Promotes awareness about sexual health, education, and rights.
importance: Addresses STI prevention and reproductive health education.
Promotes access to sexual healthcare services worldwide.

title: World Physiotherapy Day
description: Celebrates the work of physiotherapists in keeping people well, mobile, and independent.
importance: Highlights the role of physical therapy in rehabilitation and pain management.
Promotes movement for health and wellbeing across the lifespan.

title: World Suicide Prevention Day
description: Promotes worldwide commitment and action to prevent suicides.
importance: Raises awareness about suicide as a major public health problem.
Encourages mental health support and crisis intervention strategies.

title: World Patient Safety Day
description: Enhances global understanding of patient safety and promotes patient safety actions.
importance: Addresses medical errors and healthcare-associated harm.
Promotes safety protocols and systems in healthcare settings.

title: World Alzheimer's Day
description: Raises awareness about Alzheimer's disease and dementia.
importance: Promotes understanding of cognitive decline and dementia care.
Supports research efforts for treatment and prevention.

title: World Contraception Day
description: Improves awareness of contraception and enables young people to make informed choices on their sexual and reproductive health.
importance: Promotes family planning and reproductive health education.
Addresses barriers to contraception access worldwide.

title: International Day of Older Persons
description: Raises awareness about issues affecting the elderly and appreciates the contributions they make to society.
importance: Addresses healthcare needs specific to aging populations.
Promotes dignity and access to care for elderly individuals.

title: World Hospice and Palliative Care Day
description: Builds awareness and understanding of the needs of people living with life-limiting illnesses.
importance: Promotes access to palliative care as a human right.
Educates about end-of-life care and pain management.

title: World Arthritis Day
description: Raises awareness about rheumatic and musculoskeletal diseases.
importance: Promotes early diagnosis and access to treatment for arthritis.
Highlights the impact of arthritis on quality of life and productivity.

title: Global Handwashing Day
description: Increases awareness about the importance of handwashing with soap as an effective way to prevent diseases.
importance: Promotes a simple, cost-effective method of infection prevention.
Highlights the role of hand hygiene in reducing healthcare-associated infections.

title: World Food Day
description: Promotes worldwide awareness and action for those who suffer from hunger and for the need to ensure food security and nutritious diets for all.
importance: Addresses malnutrition as a major public health issue.
Promotes sustainable food systems for better health outcomes.

title: World Trauma Day
description: Highlights the increasing rate of accidents and injuries causing death and disability worldwide.
importance: Promotes injury prevention and emergency response systems.
Raises awareness about trauma care and rehabilitation services.

title: World Osteoporosis Day
description: Raises global awareness of the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of osteoporosis.
importance: Promotes bone health and fracture prevention strategies.
Highlights the importance of calcium, vitamin D, and exercise for bone health.

title: World Pneumonia Day
description: Raises awareness about pneumonia, the world's leading infectious killer of children under five.
importance: Promotes pneumonia prevention through vaccination and environmental measures.
Advocates for accessible diagnosis and treatment worldwide.

title: World Prematurity Day
description: Raises awareness of the challenges of preterm birth and the impacts it has on families.
importance: Highlights the specialized medical care needed for premature infants.
Promotes prenatal care to prevent preterm births.

title: Universal Health Coverage Day
description: Promotes the goal of all people receiving quality health services without suffering financial hardship.
importance: Advocates for healthcare as a fundamental human right.
Promotes equitable access to essential health services globally.

title: World Religion Day
description: Promotes interfaith understanding and harmony between religions.
importance: Encourages spiritual approaches to health and healing.
Promotes compassion and care ethics across faith traditions.

title: International Epilepsy Day
description: Promotes awareness about epilepsy and its impact on people's lives.
importance: Reduces stigma associated with seizure disorders.
Advocates for better diagnosis and treatment options.

title: Rare Disease Day
description: Raises awareness about rare diseases and their impact on patients' lives.
importance: Highlights challenges in diagnosis and treatment of rare conditions.
Promotes research and development of orphan drugs.

title: World Lymphedema Day
description: Increases awareness about lymphedema and lymphatic diseases.
importance: Educates about early detection and management strategies.
Advocates for improved insurance coverage for treatment.

title: International Women's Day
description: Celebrates women's achievements and promotes gender equality in healthcare.
importance: Highlights women's health issues and disparities in medical research.
Promotes women's leadership in healthcare professions.

title: World Glaucoma Day
description: Raises awareness about glaucoma and the importance of regular eye examinations.
importance: Promotes early detection to prevent vision loss.
Educates about treatment options for this leading cause of blindness.

title: National Sleep Awareness Day
description: Highlights the importance of quality sleep for overall health.
importance: Promotes understanding of sleep disorders and their impact on health.
Encourages healthy sleep habits and sleep hygiene.

title: World Down Syndrome Day
description: Raises public awareness about Down syndrome and the importance of inclusion.
importance: Promotes understanding of health issues common in Down syndrome.
Advocates for equitable healthcare access for people with disabilities.

title: National Alcohol Screening Day
description: Raises awareness about alcohol misuse and encourages screening for alcohol use disorders.
importance: Promotes early intervention for alcohol-related health problems.
Educates about the health risks of excessive alcohol consumption.

title: World Liver Day
description: Raises awareness about liver diseases and their prevention.
importance: Educates about risk factors for liver disease including alcohol and viral hepatitis.
Promotes liver health through proper nutrition and lifestyle choices.

title: World Day for Safety and Health at Work
description: Promotes the prevention of occupational accidents and diseases globally.
importance: Highlights workplace health hazards and safety protocols.
Advocates for preventive safety culture in healthcare settings.

title: World Asthma Day
description: Increases awareness about asthma and improves care throughout the world.
importance: Educates about asthma triggers and management strategies.
Promotes access to effective asthma medications worldwide.

title: World Hand Hygiene Day
description: Emphasizes the importance of hand hygiene in healthcare settings.
importance: Reduces healthcare-associated infections through proper hand hygiene.
Promotes patient safety in healthcare environments.

title: World IBD Day
description: Raises awareness about inflammatory bowel diseases including Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis.
importance: Reduces stigma associated with chronic digestive disorders.
Promotes research for better treatments and potential cures.

title: World Hunger Day
description: Highlights sustainable solutions to hunger and poverty worldwide.
importance: Addresses malnutrition as a critical public health issue.
Promotes sustainable food systems and nutritional security.

title: World Food Safety Day
description: Draws attention to foodborne risks and promotes safe food handling practices.
importance: Prevents foodborne illnesses through education about proper food handling.
Promotes food safety standards in production and distribution.

title: International Albinism Awareness Day
description: Promotes awareness and understanding of albinism and the rights of people with albinism.
importance: Highlights specific health needs including skin cancer prevention.
Advocates for access to vision care and dermatological services.

title: World Sickle Cell Day
description: Increases public knowledge and understanding of sickle cell disease.
importance: Promotes early screening and diagnosis of this genetic blood disorder.
Advocates for comprehensive treatment and pain management protocols.

title: World Microbiome Day
description: Celebrates the importance of microorganisms for human health and the environment.
importance: Highlights the role of gut microbiota in overall health.
Promotes research into microbiome-based therapies.

title: World Population Day
description: Focuses attention on the importance of population issues in global health.
importance: Addresses healthcare access in rapidly growing populations.
Promotes family planning services and reproductive health education.

title: World Brain Day
description: Increases public awareness and promotes advocacy related to brain health.
importance: Educates about neurological disorders and their prevention.
Promotes brain-healthy lifestyles throughout the lifespan.

title: International Self-Care Day
description: Raises awareness about the importance of self-care in maintaining health.
importance: Promotes preventive health practices and personal health responsibility.
Encourages balanced approach to physical and mental wellbeing.

title: World Day Against Trafficking in Persons
description: Raises awareness about human trafficking and its health consequences.
importance: Addresses physical and mental health impacts on trafficking victims.
Promotes trauma-informed care for survivors.

title: World Physical Therapy Day
description: Raises awareness about the crucial contribution physiotherapists make to healthcare.
importance: Promotes rehabilitation services for injury and disability.
Highlights the role of physical activity in health maintenance.

title: International Youth Day
description: Raises awareness about issues affecting young people including mental health.
importance: Addresses adolescent health needs and risky behaviors.
Promotes youth engagement in health policy and education.

title: World Humanitarian Day
description: Honors humanitarian aid workers and those who have lost their lives in humanitarian service.
importance: Highlights emergency healthcare provision in crisis situations.
Promotes protection of healthcare workers in conflict zones.

title: World Mosquito Day
description: Commemorates the discovery of the mosquito's role in malaria transmission.
importance: Raises awareness about mosquito-borne diseases like malaria, dengue, and Zika.
Promotes prevention strategies including insect control measures.

title: World First Aid Day
description: Promotes the importance of first aid training in preventing injuries and saving lives.
importance: Encourages basic first aid skills for emergency response.
Highlights the role of immediate care in improving outcomes.

title: World Lymphoma Awareness Day
description: Raises awareness about lymphoma and its symptoms for earlier diagnosis.
importance: Educates about this common but often misdiagnosed blood cancer.
Promotes recognition of symptoms for early detection.

title: World Bamboo Day
description: Promotes the use of bamboo for sustainable development and health applications.
importance: Highlights bamboo's antimicrobial properties in medical applications.
Promotes sustainable materials for healthcare facilities.

title: World Rabies Day
description: Raises awareness about rabies prevention and highlights progress toward eliminating human rabies deaths.
importance: Promotes animal vaccination to prevent this deadly disease.
Educates about post-exposure prophylaxis when bites occur.

title: World Teachers' Day
description: Recognizes the role of teachers in health education and promotion.
importance: Highlights school-based health education programs.
Promotes teacher training in health and wellness topics.

title: World Thrombosis Day
description: Focuses attention on the often overlooked and misunderstood condition of thrombosis.
importance: Educates about risk factors for blood clots including travel and surgery.
Promotes awareness of symptoms requiring immediate medical attention.

title: World Stroke Day
description: Raises awareness about the prevention and treatment of stroke.
importance: Educates about stroke warning signs and emergency response.
Promotes risk factor management including hypertension control.

title: International Day to End Impunity for Crimes Against Journalists
description: Highlights the role of accurate health journalism and protecting those who report on health issues.
importance: Promotes accurate public health information dissemination.
Supports protection for journalists covering health crises.

title: World Antibiotic Awareness Week
description: Increases awareness of antibiotic resistance and promotes responsible use of antibiotics.
importance: Addresses the growing threat of antimicrobial resistance.
Promotes antibiotic stewardship in healthcare settings.

title: World COPD Day
description: Raises awareness about Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease and its treatment.
importance: Promotes smoking cessation as primary prevention.
Educates about pulmonary rehabilitation and management strategies.

title: International Day for the Elimination of Violence Against Women
description: Addresses violence against women as a major public health issue.
importance: Highlights the physical and mental health consequences of gender-based violence.
Promotes trauma-informed healthcare for survivors.

title: Universal Health Coverage Day
description: Promotes access to quality healthcare without financial hardship.
importance: Advocates for healthcare as a human right for all people.
Addresses disparities in healthcare access worldwide.

title: International Migrants Day
description: Raises awareness about the health needs of migrants and refugees.
importance: Addresses barriers to healthcare faced by mobile populations.
Promotes culturally competent care for diverse communities.

title: World Hepatitis Day
description: Raises awareness about viral hepatitis and promotes prevention, diagnosis, and treatment.
importance: Educates about the different types of hepatitis and their transmission.
Promotes vaccination and testing for hepatitis B and C.

title: World Tuberculosis Day
description: Raises public awareness about the devastating health, social, and economic consequences of tuberculosis.
importance: Promotes efforts to end the global TB epidemic.
Encourages early diagnosis and treatment.

title: International Day of Persons with Disabilities
description: Promotes the rights and well-being of persons with disabilities in all spheres of society.
importance: Raises awareness about disability issues.
Encourages inclusion and accessibility in healthcare.

title: World Heart Day
description: Raises awareness about cardiovascular diseases and promotes heart-healthy living.
importance: Encourages prevention and control of heart disease.
Promotes healthy lifestyle choices.

title: World Diabetes Day
description: Raises awareness about diabetes and its impact on health.
importance: Promotes education about diabetes prevention and management.
Encourages healthy lifestyle choices.

title: World Mental Health Day
description: Raises awareness about mental health issues and promotes mental well-being.
importance: Encourages open discussions about mental health.
Promotes access to mental health care.

title: World Blood Donor Day
description: Thanks voluntary blood donors and raises awareness about the need for regular blood donations.
importance: Promotes safe blood supplies for medical treatments and emergencies.
Educates about the life-saving importance of blood donation.
